story:
What happens when you visit a country and fall in love with the mountains, the oceans and the people?

If it’s me, you decide to take a chance, change your life and use your life experience towards making a difference. That’s what happened to me in 2012 when I first visited Ecuador.

As an American, and a Latina, I couldn’t help but view my life through privilege as I became acquainted with a peaceful people with a rich culture and a diversity of customs in such a small country. Although this country may be rich in natural resources there is much poverty here too.

I was surprised to learn that the average wage in Ecuador in 2014 was $340 per month.  That wouldn’t get very far in the USA but here a family of five or more must survive even when work is scarce and infrequent. I was also surprised at how basic needs are often not met in some areas near our land.

I wondered how I could use my work to make a difference for a people I had come to appreciate and care for.  

My profession for the last twenty years has been in the field of conscious leadership, inspiration and personal development.  How could I apply my experience and skills to make a greater impact?

This question was the beginning of this idea called Oasis and my shift towards social entrepreneurship.

Social Entrepreneurship | Social Impact
Social entrepreneurship is the attempt to draw upon business techniques to find solutions to social problems.  Through our Oasis project we provide economic support by generating jobs that shift families out of extreme poverty.  

We estimate that in the last four months here we have contributed about $20,000.00 to the local economy through employment, using local vendors and resources and buying locally sourced materials.  That is a huge impact in this area of fishermen and farmers.


Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.

OASIS is a place to reconnect spiritually, emotionally, physically and intellectually to self and to others through community, what we in Ecuador call convivencia. 

Our vision is that OASIS becomes a community of people from around the globe who value reflection, renewal and spirit as source for their greatest creative expression. OASIS is a place for those seeking a retreat, or a "time in",  from busyness and chaos. 

Those coming to Oasis have the opportunity to amplify their own development by participating in our social programs (teaching English, tourism training, community gardens and more).  A percentage of our income will go to a fund specifically for community and cultural support so we can continue to support this community. We are committed to making a positive impact on our local community here in Ecuador. Every dollar that goes to our project directly affects someone here in our community by providing work and economic sustenance.

If you are someone who desires more from life and are open to engaging a deep inquiry with Self, open your heart and engage a conversation with life itself. Oasis is a place of peace and tranquility to practice opening yourself to Love. On ancestral land full of healing energy and with experienced guides you are held in a safe space.

Everyone needs this kind of place but there are too few places like this. Oasis in Ecuador is that place. 

We believe that it is our responsibility to contribute to the wellbeing of our neighbors.  

To meet some of the Ecuadorian people who are part of our community please watch this short video.  I want to share a bit of their lives with you and how our project is making a significant difference in their lives. 



Tito is a maestro, an artisan with a mastery of traditional building skills.  Sometimes maestros concentrate only in construction or only bricklaying or only tiles.  Others have skills that are broader, like Tito. He is our “go to” maestro and he has been instrumental in helping us redesign our buildings to accommodate the environment here. He has an artist eye with a practical application.  Because of the work we provide he brings home a steady $600 month or more.

Our project is providing his family almost twice the average monthly Ecuadorian salary.  His children have new clothes for school and his wife has started a small food service business.  We had a wonderful time at his wife’s birthday party that was full of laughter. We brought two birthday cakes and fed about forty people that day that stopped by for a slice.


Nicolas
Nicolas is our #2. He picks up where Tito leaves off. A quiet, diligent man he keeps mostly to himself and is tireless in his work.  We nicknamed him the “energizer bunny” because he would autograph his work with a bunny and because he never seems to tire.  Nicolas brings home $400 per month or more. He has used his money to finish building his house that up until now he could not complete because of lack of money. His quality life has greatly improved.

Victor
Victor is a master woodworker.  If it’s wood, he is working it. He built the strong front door, will be working all the floors and the bamboo ceiling, the large closets and more. His artisanry shows in his attention to design and detail. Victor brings his 11-year old son to work and it’s a pleasure seeing him teach his craft to his son.  Victor has earned about $4000 working on our project, which is like winning the lottery.

There are other workers and maestros we use based on the work needed. They are excited to be working with us not only because of the income but also because they are working on a project that also provides self-respect and pride for their work.

Anita and Blanquita
There are two women who live on each side of our property. Anita and Blanquita. Anita was living with no electricity or direct access to water. She would have to use buckets to bring the water up the hill. She has five daughters and works sporadically as a cook in a nearby hostel. Yet, she is always smiling and offers to help in many ways. She now does our laundry and brings us lunch to the construction site for us and for the other workers.  Her girls had stopped going to school because they needed to work. Now the two younger daughters are back in school with new school supplies.

Because our area is known to experience an occasional drought we built a large cistern and when we created the water flow plan to our buildings we included a pipe that runs water to Anita’s house and to Blanquita’s house so they would never be without water.

Blanquita is a single woman whose children are grown and gone. We could not build Oasis without her. She kept our supplies safe from thieves and the elements by allowing us to store them under her house. She comes in to sweep the dust every week. Recently she gave me a lovely hand made purse and hammock.  We have told her we would allow her to sell her artisan works at Oasis when we complete our project.

The two women earn about $50 a week or $200 a month from their work with us, which keeps them from extreme poverty. We have also shared our building supplies with them so that they can improve their homes. Their gift to us comes through goodwill and a daily smile.


The Kids
I started my first English class this week. I managed to get a photo of our “classroom” but once the lesson was over, they scattered before I could get them into one photo. In July I’ll return with some lesson books and pencils and art supplies to continue our English classes.  These are some of the kids we have been able to help here and in other areas of Ecuador.
Every dollar that is contributed goes through OASIS to the community and its people. This is what we mean by building a community both locally and globally. 

Salango and the Rio Chico Community, the location of OASIS, is an ancient settlement located on the south coast of the province of Manabí. Archaeological findings show that spirituality and wisdom were interwoven with the environment with efforts to preserve the culture by transmitting spiritual knowledge through the generations.  Humpback whales migrate here during the months of June to September. These animals are symbolic for the people of the Manabí culture.

This is an area of farmers and fishermen, making their living from the land and sea. Life is pretty real and basic here. It teaches you to appreciate the little things and to see how simpler life can be without the fascination with material things.

I’ve learned that I really don’t need a lot to live a happy and fulfilled life.  Coming here you may find that your perspective on your life changes too and you realign towards things that truly matter.

We have a heartfelt mission that is based on a practical business plan. Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.

Writers, artists, poets, musicians and photographers seeking a quiet place to reconnect with their muse come here.

Professionals who need to renew their energy and recalibrate their lives.

People who are looking for a place and guides to help them make important decisions in their lives will take the journey to find nourishment at Oasis.

Yogis, coaches and holistic health practitioners will find our space ideal for holding retreats to share their contemplative practices and wellness programs.

Women who are traveling alone and wish to safely enjoy a personal adventure and a encouraging community to explore a new country and culture and perhaps become involved in our local community service programs.

Groups – business or non-profit and socially conscious organizations – will come for the inspiration they find in the natural surroundings to develop conscious leadership to solve global challenges. Supported by our care and nourishment for the mind, heart, body and soul, teams will discover a deeper purpose for their work.

I'm Alicia Rodriguez and I'm an explorer, an entrepreneur, a storyteller, an author  and a mentor. In my "day job" I am a coach and advisor to executive women, visionary leaders and creative and social entrepreneurs.  In my private practice I work with my clients on Conscious Living - thriving in work and life through intentional practices. My partner, Napo,  is a trained psychologist and an Andean Wisdom Keeper in the Quitu Cara tradition. We both share this dream we call Oasis. Why? Because people need to find their oasis, a place of sustenance and peace for the soul, mind, and body.

In 2012 I visited Ecuador because of a call of destiny. I was meant to be there for an encounter with the ancestral wisdom of this country, to learn about love and spirituality. Through Napo’s wisdom teachings I was able to understand the marvels of the spiritual life. Our spiritual connection was immediately evident and now we are guides and facilitators for those who come to visit us in Oasis.

After sharing our lives in Ecuador and USA we decided to teach what we learned about our own encounter. We took our own experiences and created wisdom teachings that would resolve life’s significant concerns.

Based in Love and Spirituality we are companions on life’s journey with others that long for an encounter with the spiritual life. In other words, they are ready for an encounter with Self that will transform bringing greater purpose and meaning into their lives.

Now we want to make it possible for you and others to have your own life changing experience while we improve the lives of the people here in our community in Ecuador.


Right now we need $60,000.00 to build three casitas in the next nine months. With three casitas we can begin to generate income to help pay for more construction and to begin to develop our programs. All our workers are local, they are our neighbors. Our project provides work to many people in the Rio Chico community now.  We will be one of the major employers here so we will be able to contribute to the economic wellbeing of this area in the future as well.
Phase Two will be the Main House and workshop and spa space. Phase Three will be the remaining casitas and more landscaping, the pool and a vehicle.
CHECK OUT OUR ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS.  FROM PREPAYING YOUR VACATION TO LIFETIME MEMBERSHIPS TO A RAINFOREST ADVENTURE TO A VERY SPECIAL AND PERSONAL RETREAT FOR YOUR SOUL-SEARCHING TRANSFORMATION. SCROLL DOWN TO THE END OF THIS PAGE TO SEE DETAILS AND PICTURES OF OUR UNIQUE PERKS.
We are committed and on our way. To date we have already received $30,000.00 in donations (just by sharing our vision) and have contributed thousands of our own to make this dream a reality. We estimate the total cost to build OASIS at about $450,000.00.  We are here to ask your HELP.  We would like to open by early 2017.

Each casita will cost $20,000 to build and furnish and the main house will cost about $150,000 to build and furnish. We will need $80,000 for a vehicle, $40,000 for a pool and pool area and about $30,000 for the landscaping, organic gardens and fruit trees and maintenance.  We have already paid for the land and built and paid for water, electricity and internet as well as a septic tank, water cistern and fencing. Any funding will go towards the immediate phase of constructions so we can become operational by Spring 2017. 

Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.

Every dollar you pledge will directly affect someone’s life here.

You may see our buildings and the views but what is not so obvious is how the people who work to build the project are receiving the benefit of your contributions The people in these photos thank you as do we.

From traditional artistry to a pre-paid vacation to a group retreat and a rainforest adventure, our Perks are unique and focus on inspiration and transformative travel. Book your vacation now and help us out at the same time! 

SCROLL DOWN TO THE END OF THIS PAGE TO SEE DETAILS AND PICTURES OF OUR ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS.


Our greatest challenge is funding.  We have already made a significant investment ourselves.  One advantage is that Napo is Ecuadorian and he knows his way around the bureaucracy that can often causes delays. He is also steward of hectares of family owned rainforest so he has experience in agriculture and how to manage a large property. 

My background as an entrepreneur and in the hospitality business combined with my organizational background will help with the technological aspects of running OASIS and with its marketing.  Having run several retreats together we know how to create memorable and transformational experiences.  

Through our project you are also helping SUPPORT AN ENTIRE COMMUNITY  in Ecuador, to enhance their quality of life and feel empowered to grow and develop. Now and in the future. 

Because of our business experience we  teach local entrepreneurs better skills in working in tourism which is a major fountain of income in this area. We have already begun teaching English and sharing the world's cultures with the people here so they can understand better how to manage the burgeoning tourism business here without losing their own traditions.

  • You believe, like we do, that we all need a place to recover and renew, away from the chaos, so we can remain inspired and healthy in mind, body and soul.
  • You are committed in your own work to being a leader, to supporting others in reaching their potential.
  • You are interested in having a real, direct impact on people who need assistance in growing into a new world of computers, business and tourism in order to thrive in the future. Our presence here will directly affect the quality of life of the people here.
  • You know me and Napo and have worked with us and experienced how you can transform given the right support and guidance.
  • You want to be a part of a global community where you can feel at home while growing, learning and meeting other like minded people.
  • You have been looking for a place like this, where you can come and be taken care of, nurtured. Where you can find quiet spaces in your day to reflect or choose to go on an adventure in nature to a rainforest, to an island or simply a walk through our gardens.
  • You have wanted to visit Ecuador, a land of spirituality, mystery and beauty and this is your chance to do so in comfort and with friends.
  • You are planning a retreat for your group or a personal retreat for yourself in 2017.  This is an opportunity to commit at lower rates than will never be available again.

Not everyone has the discretionary income to contribute. We understand this. But there are other ways you can help that will MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE.

  • When you receive mailings from us for our Indiegogo campaign please forward them to your friends and invite them to contribute and share. You are here because you care about being part of a community where the soul can find peace in a world of chaos. Your friends and community likely share your values around making a difference in people's lives.
  • Social media is important in getting the word out. For you social media savvy people, SHARE and POST on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and anywhere else about our campaign and let your readers know why Oasis matters. Use hashtag #oasisinecuador and @aliciarod.
  • Any bloggers out there? I'm available for interviews and to write guest posts for your blog in exchange for promotion and a link to our campaign.
  • Any travel bloggers or travel agents out there? I'd love to write about Ecuador and what it's like to travel through this beautiful country.
  • Any personal growth gurus out there? I'm available to speak or write on transformational travel as a way to find one's true nature.  I'd love to share my personal story - actually a kind of love story - about what brought me to Ecuador and how it changed my life.
  • Indiegogo has its own sharing tools.  Please use them.
  • We are looking for "evangelists" (Guy Kawasaki's word!) people who believe in our vision, to talk it up at your next social gathering or with friends or colleagues or with your yoga teacher and others who might be interested in bringing their retreats here. 
  • We welcome well wishes and good vibrations to keep us on our path!
Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.

Thank you! Muchisimas Gracias! Nos vemos pronto! (We'll see you soon - hopefully in Ecuador!)
__________________________________________________________________________
(Note: 1. Shipping is extra and dependent on destination. For international shipping contact me directly. 2. Pre-paid stays must be booked in advance, space available basis and taken within two years of opening. 3. All transportation such as air travel is paid on your own and not included in our perks.)



From both of us, our deepest thanks and gratitude!  Please support Oasis In Ecuador NOW with your donation.  

Every dollar you pledge will directly affect someone’s life here.

You may see our buildings and the views but what is not so obvious is how the people who work to build the project are receiving the benefit of your contributions.  The people in these photos thank you as do we.
story_txt:
What happens when you visit a country and fall in love with the mountains, the oceans and the people?
If it’s me, you decide to take a chance, change your life and use your life experience towards making a difference. That’s what happened to me in 2012 when I first visited Ecuador.As an American, and a Latina, I couldn’t help but view my life through privilege as I became acquainted with a peaceful people with a rich culture and a diversity of customs in such a small country. Although this country may be rich in natural resources there is much poverty here too.I was surprised to learn that the average wage in Ecuador in 2014 was $340 per month.  That wouldn’t get very far in the USA but here a family of five or more must survive even when work is scarce and infrequent. I was also surprised at how basic needs are often not met in some areas near our land.I wondered how I could use my work to make a difference for a people I had come to appreciate and care for.  
My profession for the last twenty years has been in the field of conscious leadership, inspiration and personal development.  How could I apply my experience and skills to make a greater impact?This question was the beginning of this idea called Oasis and my shift towards social entrepreneurship.Social Entrepreneurship | Social ImpactSocial entrepreneurship is the attempt to draw upon business techniques to find solutions to social problems.  Through our Oasis project we provide economic support by generating jobs that shift families out of extreme poverty.  We estimate that in the last four months here we have contributed about $20,000.00 to the local economy through employment, using local vendors and resources and buying locally sourced materials.  That is a huge impact in this area of fishermen and farmers.



Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.
OASIS is a place to reconnect spiritually, emotionally, physically and intellectually to self and to others through community, what we in Ecuador call convivencia. 
Our vision is that OASIS becomes a community of people from around the globe who value reflection, renewal and spirit as source for their greatest creative expression. OASIS is a place for those seeking a retreat, or a "time in",  from busyness and chaos. Those coming to Oasis have the opportunity to amplify their own development by participating in our social programs (teaching English, tourism training, community gardens and more).  A percentage of our income will go to a fund specifically for community and cultural support so we can continue to support this community. We are committed to making a positive impact on our local community here in Ecuador. Every dollar that goes to our project directly affects someone here in our community by providing work and economic sustenance.
If you are someone who desires more from life and are open to engaging a deep inquiry with Self, open your heart and engage a conversation with life itself. Oasis is a place of peace and tranquility to practice opening yourself to Love. On ancestral land full of healing energy and with experienced guides you are held in a safe space.


Everyone needs this kind of place but there are too few places like this. Oasis in Ecuador is that place. 








We believe that it is our responsibility to contribute to the wellbeing of our neighbors.  

To meet some of the Ecuadorian people who are part of our community please watch this short video.  I want to share a bit of their lives with you and how our project is making a significant difference in their lives. 







Tito is a maestro, an artisan with a mastery of traditional building skills.  Sometimes maestros concentrate only in construction or only bricklaying or only tiles.  Others have skills that are broader, like Tito. He is our “go to” maestro and he has been instrumental in helping us redesign our buildings to accommodate the environment here. He has an artist eye with a practical application.  Because of the work we provide he brings home a steady $600 month or more.Our project is providing his family almost twice the average monthly Ecuadorian salary.  His children have new clothes for school and his wife has started a small food service business.  We had a wonderful time at his wife’s birthday party that was full of laughter. We brought two birthday cakes and fed about forty people that day that stopped by for a slice.NicolasNicolas is our #2. He picks up where Tito leaves off. A quiet, diligent man he keeps mostly to himself and is tireless in his work.  We nicknamed him the “energizer bunny” because he would autograph his work with a bunny and because he never seems to tire.  Nicolas brings home $400 per month or more. He has used his money to finish building his house that up until now he could not complete because of lack of money. His quality life has greatly improved.VictorVictor is a master woodworker.  If it’s wood, he is working it. He built the strong front door, will be working all the floors and the bamboo ceiling, the large closets and more. His artisanry shows in his attention to design and detail. Victor brings his 11-year old son to work and it’s a pleasure seeing him teach his craft to his son.  Victor has earned about $4000 working on our project, which is like winning the lottery.There are other workers and maestros we use based on the work needed. They are excited to be working with us not only because of the income but also because they are working on a project that also provides self-respect and pride for their work.Anita and BlanquitaThere are two women who live on each side of our property. Anita and Blanquita. Anita was living with no electricity or direct access to water. She would have to use buckets to bring the water up the hill. She has five daughters and works sporadically as a cook in a nearby hostel. Yet, she is always smiling and offers to help in many ways. She now does our laundry and brings us lunch to the construction site for us and for the other workers.  Her girls had stopped going to school because they needed to work. Now the two younger daughters are back in school with new school supplies.Because our area is known to experience an occasional drought we built a large cistern and when we created the water flow plan to our buildings we included a pipe that runs water to Anita’s house and to Blanquita’s house so they would never be without water.Blanquita is a single woman whose children are grown and gone. We could not build Oasis without her. She kept our supplies safe from thieves and the elements by allowing us to store them under her house. She comes in to sweep the dust every week. Recently she gave me a lovely hand made purse and hammock.  We have told her we would allow her to sell her artisan works at Oasis when we complete our project.The two women earn about $50 a week or $200 a month from their work with us, which keeps them from extreme poverty. We have also shared our building supplies with them so that they can improve their homes. Their gift to us comes through goodwill and a daily smile.The KidsI started my first English class this week. I managed to get a photo of our “classroom” but once the lesson was over, they scattered before I could get them into one photo. In July I’ll return with some lesson books and pencils and art supplies to continue our English classes.  These are some of the kids we have been able to help here and in other areas of Ecuador.


Every dollar that is contributed goes through OASIS to the community and its people. This is what we mean by building a community both locally and globally. 



Salango and the Rio Chico Community, the location of OASIS, is an ancient settlement located on the south coast of the province of Manabí. Archaeological findings show that spirituality and wisdom were interwoven with the environment with efforts to preserve the culture by transmitting spiritual knowledge through the generations.  Humpback whales migrate here during the months of June to September. These animals are symbolic for the people of the Manabí culture.


This is an area of farmers and fishermen, making their living from the land and sea. Life is pretty real and basic here. It teaches you to appreciate the little things and to see how simpler life can be without the fascination with material things.I’ve learned that I really don’t need a lot to live a happy and fulfilled life.  Coming here you may find that your perspective on your life changes too and you realign towards things that truly matter.




We have a heartfelt mission that is based on a practical business plan. Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.

Writers, artists, poets, musicians and photographers seeking a quiet place to reconnect with their muse come here.
Professionals who need to renew their energy and recalibrate their lives.
People who are looking for a place and guides to help them make important decisions in their lives will take the journey to find nourishment at Oasis.
Yogis, coaches and holistic health practitioners will find our space ideal for holding retreats to share their contemplative practices and wellness programs.
Women who are traveling alone and wish to safely enjoy a personal adventure and a encouraging community to explore a new country and culture and perhaps become involved in our local community service programs.
Groups – business or non-profit and socially conscious organizations – will come for the inspiration they find in the natural surroundings to develop conscious leadership to solve global challenges. Supported by our care and nourishment for the mind, heart, body and soul, teams will discover a deeper purpose for their work.

I'm Alicia Rodriguez and I'm an explorer, an entrepreneur, a storyteller, an author  and a mentor. In my "day job" I am a coach and advisor to executive women, visionary leaders and creative and social entrepreneurs.  In my private practice I work with my clients on Conscious Living  - thriving in work and life through intentional practices. My partner, Napo,  is a trained psychologist and an
Andean Wisdom Keeper in the Quitu Cara tradition. We both share this dream we
call Oasis. Why? Because people need to find their oasis, a place of sustenance
and peace for the soul, mind, and body.



In 2012 I visited Ecuador because of a call of destiny. I was meant
to be there for an encounter with the ancestral wisdom of this country, to
learn about love and spirituality. Through Napo’s wisdom teachings I was
able to understand the marvels of the spiritual life. Our spiritual connection was immediately evident
and now we are guides and facilitators for those who come to visit us in Oasis.
After sharing our lives in Ecuador and USA we decided to
teach what we learned about our own encounter. We took our own experiences and
created wisdom teachings that would resolve life’s significant concerns.
Based in Love and Spirituality we are companions on life’s
journey with others that long for an encounter with the spiritual life. In
other words, they are ready for an encounter with Self that will transform bringing greater purpose and meaning into their lives.

Now we want to make it possible for you and others to have your own life changing experience while we improve the lives of the people here in our community in Ecuador.



Right now we need $60,000.00 to build three casitas in the next nine months. With three casitas we can begin to generate income to help pay for more construction and to begin to develop our programs. All our workers are local, they are our neighbors. Our project provides work to many people in the Rio Chico community now.  We will be one of the major employers here so we will be able to contribute to the economic wellbeing of this area in the future as well.Phase Two will be the Main House and workshop and spa space. Phase Three will be the remaining casitas and more landscaping, the pool and a vehicle.CHECK OUT OUR ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS.  FROM PREPAYING YOUR VACATION TO LIFETIME MEMBERSHIPS TO A RAINFOREST ADVENTURE TO A VERY SPECIAL AND PERSONAL RETREAT FOR YOUR SOUL-SEARCHING TRANSFORMATION. SCROLL DOWN TO THE END OF THIS PAGE TO SEE DETAILS AND PICTURES OF OUR UNIQUE PERKS.We are committed and on our way. To date we have already received $30,000.00 in donations (just by sharing our vision) and have contributed thousands of our own to make this dream a reality. We estimate the total cost to build OASIS at about $450,000.00.  We are here to ask your HELP.  We would like to open by early 2017.



Each casita will cost $20,000 to build and furnish and the main house will cost about $150,000 to build and furnish. We will need $80,000 for a vehicle, $40,000 for a pool and pool area and about $30,000 for the landscaping, organic gardens and fruit trees and maintenance.  We have already paid for the land and built and paid for water, electricity and internet as well as a septic tank, water cistern and fencing. Any funding will go towards the immediate phase of constructions so we can become operational by Spring 2017. 
Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.

Every dollar you pledge will directly affect someone’s life here.
You may see our buildings and the views but what is not so obvious is how the people who work to build the project are receiving the benefit of your contributions The people in these photos thank you as do we.







From traditional artistry to a pre-paid vacation to a group retreat and a rainforest adventure, our Perks are unique and focus on inspiration and transformative travel. Book your vacation now and help us out at the same time! 
SCROLL DOWN TO THE END OF THIS PAGE TO SEE DETAILS AND PICTURES OF OUR ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS.





Our greatest challenge
is funding.  We have already made a significant investment ourselves.  One advantage is that Napo is Ecuadorian and he
knows his way around the bureaucracy that can often causes delays. He is also
steward of hectares of family owned rainforest so he has experience in
agriculture and how to manage a large property. 

My background as an
entrepreneur and in the hospitality business combined with my organizational
background will help with the technological aspects of running OASIS and with
its marketing.  Having run several retreats together we know how to create
memorable and transformational experiences.  
Through our project you are also helping SUPPORT AN ENTIRE COMMUNITY  in Ecuador, to enhance their quality of life and feel empowered to grow and develop. Now and in the future. 
Because of our business experience we  teach local entrepreneurs better skills in working in tourism which is a major fountain of income in this area. We have already begun teaching English and sharing the world's cultures with the people here so they can understand better how to manage the burgeoning tourism business here without losing their own traditions.





You believe, like we do, that we all need a place to recover and renew, away from the chaos, so we can remain inspired and healthy in mind, body and soul.
You are committed in your own work to being a leader, to supporting others in reaching their potential.
You are interested in having a real, direct impact on people who need assistance in growing into a new world of computers, business and tourism in order to thrive in the future. Our presence here will directly affect the quality of life of the people here.
You know me and Napo and have worked with us and experienced how you can transform given the right support and guidance.
You want to be a part of a global community where you can feel at home while growing, learning and meeting other like minded people.
You have been looking for a place like this, where you can come and be taken care of, nurtured. Where you can find quiet spaces in your day to reflect or choose to go on an adventure in nature to a rainforest, to an island or simply a walk through our gardens.
You have wanted to visit Ecuador, a land of spirituality, mystery and beauty and this is your chance to do so in comfort and with friends.
You are planning a retreat for your group or a personal retreat for yourself in 2017.  This is an opportunity to commit at lower rates than will never be available again.



Not everyone has the discretionary income to contribute. We understand this. But there are other ways you can help that will MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE.  When you receive mailings from us for our Indiegogo campaign please forward them to your friends and invite them to contribute and share. You are here because you care about being part of a community where the soul can find peace in a world of chaos. Your friends and community likely share your values around making a difference in people's lives.
Social media is important in getting the word out. For you social media savvy people, SHARE and POST on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and anywhere else about our campaign and let your readers know why Oasis matters. Use hashtag #oasisinecuador and @aliciarod.
Any bloggers out there? I'm available for interviews and to write guest posts for your blog in exchange for promotion and a link to our campaign.
Any travel bloggers or travel agents out there? I'd love to write about Ecuador and what it's like to travel through this beautiful country.
Any personal growth gurus out there? I'm available to speak or write on transformational travel as a way to find one's true nature.  I'd love to share my personal story - actually a kind of love story - about what brought me to Ecuador and how it changed my life.
Indiegogo has its own sharing tools.  Please use them.

We are looking for "evangelists" (Guy Kawasaki's word!) people who believe in our vision, to talk it up at your next social gathering or with friends or colleagues or with your yoga teacher and others who might be interested in bringing their retreats here. 
We welcome well wishes and good vibrations to keep us on our path!


Get details on our vision and business plan HERE.




Thank you! Muchisimas Gracias! Nos vemos pronto! (We'll see you soon - hopefully in Ecuador!)
__________________________________________________________________________
(Note: 1. Shipping is extra and dependent on destination. For international shipping contact me directly. 2. Pre-paid stays must be booked in advance, space available basis and taken within two years of opening. 3. All transportation such as air travel is paid on your own and not included in our perks.)























From both of us, our deepest thanks and gratitude!  Please support Oasis In Ecuador NOW with your donation.  





Every dollar you pledge will directly affect someone’s life here.


You may see our buildings and the views but what is not so obvious is how the people who work to build the project are receiving the benefit of your contributions.  The people in these photos thank you as do we.

story:
Beyuls are the Secret
to Fulfilling Dreams . . .
and Solving the Puzzle of Life

Dreams.

They make life fun, exciting, even thrilling. 

But do you ever wonder if you'll ever be able to fulfill your dreams? 

Guess what? Fulfilling your dreams is the key to making sense out of life. 

When you contribute to this campaign, we'll:

  • Give you a place to share your dreams, your passions, and turn them into a project others can support
  • Help you gather a team, get the resources you need, and learn the skills you'll need to make your project real
  • Make it fun, exciting, and connect you with others so you never feel alone on the path to making your dreams real 

Chris Attwood, the dreamer behind this project, has been helping people realize their dreams and live their passions for quite a while. He:

Co-authored the NY Times bestseller, The Passion Test, and has trained over 1,500 Passion Test facilitators in more than 60 countries

  • Helped one of his students, an unknown Australian TV producer named Rhonda Byrne, realize her dream of creating a movie that "would change the world"--her movie, "The Secret" has been watched by hundreds of millions of people and her #1 NY Times bestselling book has sold millions of copies
  • Introduced his colleague, T. Harv Eker, to the literary agent that helped him get a 7-figure book deal and helped him refine the strategy that brought tens of thousands of people to his workshops and seminars

  • Made the introductions that allowed an unknown hypnotist named Tellman Knudson fulfill his dream of building a successful online business that generated over $10 million a year in revenues
  • Helped a client double the revenues in her business and fulfill her dream of buying her own beautiful home
  • Helped other clients get six or seven figure book deals and fulfill the dream of becoming a NY Times bestselling author
Now he wants to create a way to help LOTS more people fulfill their dreams and live their passions--starting with you . . .

The Vision

"When your dreams get fulfilled it's the way life 
tells you that you're aligned with your life's purpose."

1)  Create an online Beyul - a sacred space - where you, as a member, can share your passions and rally support  -- create a team, get support, and  find resources; plus connect with others, and yourself to solve the puzzle of your own life 

2)  Provide you with access to world class training—so you can gain the knowledge and training to realize your passion projects, and to deal with life’s challenges along the way

3)  Build physical Beyuls - centers of healing and renewal where you can restore yourself, which provide the ultimate reward for your success, and which use ancient technologies to transmit coherence & peace

What is a Beyul?

*Beyuls (Tibetan: སྦས་ཡུལ, Wylie: sbas-yul) are sacred hidden valleys blessed as refuges, where the physical and spiritual worlds overlap, according to the beliefs of the Nyingma school of Tibetan Buddhism. We've expanded this definition to include the quiet place of peace that exists in every heart where the physical and spiritual worlds also overlap and which is the key to fulfilling your heart's desires.

The Steps

What Your Contribution Will Help Create

Global Community:

  • A platform to both give and get support & resources for pursuing your own passion projects
  • 24/7 Access to experts on topics that directly affect your project and your life - business management, online marketing, as well as finances, relationships, etc.
  • Access to like-minded individuals to collaborate with
  • Providing both personal growth and social action

World Class Training:

  • Access to knowledge & experience to realize your passion project
  • Access to help and wisdom to deal effectively with life's challenges
  • Courses and resources - available at your convenience - that will jump-start you to the next level of your life such as:
Discover your purpose • Uncover your genius • Grow your business • Perfect your relationships • Optimize your health • Expand your wealth

Beyul Resorts:

  • Creating Beyul Sanctuaries where you can where you can relax, reflect & rejuvenate 
  • Centers for healing and renewal to visit on an individual journey or travel to with your loved ones.
  • Using modern technologies to integrate with nature
  • Using ancient technologies to act as transmitters of coherence and peace

Our Indiegogo Goal: $50,000
+$100,000 from Founding Members

  • To demonstrate that many peop1e are wi11ing to say, through their contributions, "I want to see The Heaven on Earth Project become a reality!"
  • To build Stage 1 of the online community platform to launch in Fa11, 2016 so we can begin 1earning and collaborating together
  • To purchase an option on land for the first Beyu1 so you know you'11 have a p1ace to come


What You Get When You Contribute

First and foremost, your contribution is your vote in favor of this project and its vision. To achieve its aims, the Heaven on Earth Project will require financial support from those who've been fortunate enough to create wealth in their own lives. They will only give that support when they see that there are people all around the world who believe in this vision. So, if you think everything you've seen here is worth creating, then please make a contribution and share this link that will bring people to this page with everyone you know:

www.createbeyuls.com

Having said that, there's some very cool perks in store for you when you contribute!

When You Contribute $10 or more:

Introductory Membership (Value: $12):

  • Curated free training on business management, online marketing, entrepreneurship, relationships, health, discovering passion & purpose, discovering your genius and more
  • Access to the Stage 1 online platform where you can share your passion project and get support
  • Access to Personal Action Groups for working on taking action in your own life, and Social Action Groups to work on projects to address social issues
  • With achievement of our crowdfunding goal, online platform scheduled to launch in Fall, 2016

When You Contribute $25 or more:

Your Hidden Riches - Unleashing the Power of Ritual to Create a Life of Meaning and Purpose (Value: $25) - You'll get an Introductory Membership PLUS a hardcover copy of the NY Times bestseller by Chris Attwood and Janet Bray Attwood. Winner of the Nautilus Book Silver Award in the area of Inner Prosperity and Right Livelihood, this book is a powerful introduction to living in the space where the physical and spiritual worlds overlap.

When You Contribute $50 or more:

Meditations on Unconditional Love from Janet Bray Attwood (Value: $67) - You'll receive an Introductory Membership PLUS 34 inspiring meditations that will take you into the experience of unconditional love and what it means, accompanied by a beautiful, professionally illustrated ebook that will guide you to dive into the experience of the meditations.

When You Contribute $100, $250, $500 or more:

Recognizing Your Contribution -When you contribute $100 or more, your name will be inscribed on a special "Wall of Gratitude" in the Pavilion of the 1st Beyul Resort along with the amount of your contribution to the creation of this special and unique organization.

PLUS you choose from . . .


Online Patron Trainings - Depending on your contribution level, you'll get access to one (1), five (5), or all of the following online training programs from our Patrons and colleagues. Discover your passions and purpose, uncover your unique genius, step into the infinite, learn how to persuasively pitch your ideas to the media, and more. Here is a description of the online trainings you'll get to choose from:

Your Passion Plan from Janet Bray Attwood (Value: $197) 

  • Discover your passions & purpose with the #1 tool used worldwide
  • Create an action plan & financial plan for realizing your passions
  • Gain a decision-making tool so you know you are always aligned with your passions
  • .21 lesson video course with workbook
Women on the Edge of Evolution Online Seminar from Claire Zammit (Value: $197) 
  • 23 powerful, transformational interviews that will guide you to the essence of your own personal power
  • Overcome guilt, fear and scarcity in your relationship with money
  •  How to embrace change even when the change is difficult, painful or challenging.
  • How to move out of "catastrophe mode" and into openness, gratitude, and possibility
  • Power practices for happiness and joy that will fast-track your ability to impact your outer world
  • How to fast-track your journey to overcoming self-doubt, fear and insecurities by tapping into the greatness of your true Self.
  • And much more . . .Features Marianne Williamson, Jean Houston, Barbara Marx Hubbard, Arianna Huffington, Lisa Nichols, Iyanla van Zant, and 17 others

Happy for No Reason - Build an unshakable inner home for happiness (Value: $29.95): 
  • Discover how to tap happiness that doesn't depend on any "reason"
  • Program your mind for happiness, every day
  • 23 minute "paraliminal" created by Marci Shimoff and Paul Scheele to condition your non-conscious mind for happiness no matter what's going on in your day-to-day life

Wealth Dynamics Profile from Roger Hamilton (Value: $97) - The #1 assessment tool for entrepreneurs

  • Get clear direction on what path to follow in your job, business and investments
  • Get clarity on what advice to take, what to leave, what opportunities to say ‘yes’ to and ‘no’ to
  • Follow the right role models that reflect your unique nature, eg. Oprah created wealth very differently from Warren Buffett
  • Learn when your winning formula becomes a losing formula through the cycle of time

Journey to the Infinite Online Experience from Robert Scheinfeld (Value: $450) - 

  • Get a new, mind-bending perspective on life and living
  • Learn how to open into an ever-expanding experience of true joyfulness, power, wisdom, and abundance.
  • Understand the new rules of the new world you are about to enter
  • Get tools and resources to help you integrate everything you learned and move rapidly into action mode
  • 9 video-based lessons, Integration toolkit, PLUS 5+ hours of additional video an 9+ hours of audio support to begin living in your new world of true joyfulness

One month Mentors Channel Membership from Doron Libshtein (Value: $49) - 

  • Gain access to 1000+ hours of powerful meditations for daily improvement
  • Be guided by Eckhart Tolle to be present
  • By Dr. Andrew Weil and Dr. Dean Ornish to be healthy and whole
  • By Doreen Virtue to tap into inner wisdom and accept guidance from your angels
  • By Arianna Huffingtom to thrive in the midst of daily life
  • By Louise Hay to heal yourself from within
  • By Thich Nhat Hanh to culture compassion and openness
  • New meditations every week, 21 day meditation series released every month


When You Contribute $250, $500 or more:

Experience the Beyul Resort - The Club's first Beyul Resort is planned to open in Spring, 2021. We want you to experience what will be one of the most wonderful and unique places on our planet. Depending on your contribution level you'll get to stay for a day to 2 weeks at the Resort when it opens, hopefully in Italy, but if not there, then somewhere in southern Europe.


When You Contribute $1,000 or more:

Right Book, Right Now - The Ultimate Guide to Becoming a Published Author from Scott Hoffman, Co-founder of New York-based Folio Literary Agency

  • Comprehensive, go-at-your-own pace guide to writing, publishing and creating a bestselling non-fiction book
  • How to express your idea in a way that captures readers
  • How to value your book when approaching publishers
  • How to build a platform to support the book
  • How to create a book proposal, aka a business plan for your message
  • How to market your book effectively
  • How to title your book
  • How to decide whether to self-publish or use a traditional publisher
  • PLUS access to an exclusive online community of authors and writers where you can collaborate an ask all your questions about book publishing  of one of the world's top literary agents

PLUS

Language of Impact 14-Lesson Communication Course (Value: $2,000) - from top publishing media coach and broadcast personality, Joel Roberts

  • How to get yourself and your message into the MEDIA
  • How to deliver killer interviews once you get there
  • How to communicate with maximum IMPACT in business, whether you’re in the media or not
  • How to punch through over-loaded and ever-shortening attention spans
  • How to “grab ’em fast and keep ’em long”
  • How to use communication effectively to LEAD
  • How to command attention, inspire and move people everywhere

PLUS all the perks available at lower contribution levels.

When You Contribute $5,000:

1/2 Day Workshop on Discovering Passion & Purpose for your group or company delivered by Chris Attwood (Value: $10,000) 
  • Ignite passion in your group or company
  • Allow team members to discover their top 5 work passions, where they stand now in living those passions, and what they need to do to align their work with what matters to them
  • Create alignment between the group or company goals and team members' passions
  • Learn what lights up your team so you know how to motivate and excite them
  • For company's includes consultation on how to implement what you learn about your team from the workshop
  • Chris' travel to your site is in addition to your contribution

When You Contribute $10,000:

Annual Members (Value: $13,500) - Enjoy 1 Year Membership for 5 years!!

  • Start getting member benefits in 2017, all the way through the first year the 1st Beyul Resort is open (scheduled for Spring, 2021)
  • Full access to the passion project platform with featured exposure for your own projects
  • Choose from $250,000 in trainings per year at 50% discounts offered around the world
  • Participate in private, exclusive community groups only for full members
  • Access live stream courses and programs in your home
  • When the 1st Resort opens, bring up to 6 family members and friends for two (2) full weeks (usually membership only includes one week)
PLUS you'll receive all the other perks offered in this campaign.

Answering Your Questions

Welcome to the Heaven on Earth Project

How Will the Community Be Structured?

Who Will I Learn From?

What Will it Be Like to Visit a Beyul Resort?

How Will the Project Give Back?

Who's Behind the Project?

What Perks Do I Get When I Contribute?

What Does It Mean to Be a Member?

How Can I Become a Founding Member?

Can Companies Be Members?

How Can I Help Make the Vision Real?

A Parting Thought

Welcome to the
Heaven on Earth Project

Hidden Valleys • Blessed Refuges


I. The Beyul Community - Making Passion Projects Real

An Online Platform that:

  • Gives you a place to connect with purpose-driven people, projects, products, services and tools that help you develop, expand and sustain your passions and passion projects

  • Imagine a dating site for fulfilling dreams - Your passion and personal genius profiles match you with other members who have complimentary skills, talents, and resources

  • As your project reaches milestones, you get rewards, and access to expanded levels of support

Designs for the Online Platform 
to Share Your Passion Project

Plus, the community incudes . . .

1)  Personal Action Groups to:

  • To collaborate on your personal passion projects
  • To gain support and guidance when you're facing challenges
  • To set personal goals, to be held gently accountable, & have a structure for evaluating your progress
  • To take courses together and have working groups to review and learn together

2) Social Action Groups - Organized around 10 major global issues, such as: Terrorism and Conflict, Environment and Sustainability, Hunger and Poverty, Fair Trade and Working Conditions, Organic Food and GMOs, Universal Access to Education, etc. 

  • To collaborate on passion projects addressing a soclal issue
  • To work with and collaborate with non-profits already working in the area of your passion
  • To create and implement plans as a group that are personally meaningful
  • If you wish, to prepare a presentation for the Heaven on Earth Project annual conference for funding

3) The Heaven on Earth Project Annual Conference - Combine:  "Ted Talks," "The Clinton Global Initiative," and "Toward a Science of Consciousness." 

  • Thought leaders and industry leaders from around the world
  • Presentations live-streamed to all Introductory and Full Members world-wide
  • Founding members receive personal invitiations to attend
  • $1+ million per year from the Project donated to the Heaven on Earth Project Foundation - funds to be allocated based on projects approved by annual conference
  • Planned to begin in Fall, 2018

II. The Beyul Club - Global Lifelong Learning + Action

  • Tools, resources and a network of support to take action.
  • An online platform where you can share your own personal passion projects and get support from other members to realize them.
  • Access to some of the world's top authors, trainers and thought leaders 
  • When you solve the puzzle of your own life, you help solve the puzzle of our collective life - the Club is designed to help you solve your own life puzzle

Who will you learn from?

The Heaven on Earth Project's trainers will be called "Patrons" of the Club. Ultimately, we'll have 50 - 100 of the world's best. Those who have already given preliminary agreement to become Patrons, include:

Phil Town - #1 NY Times bestselling author of Rule #1 – Simple Strategies for Successful Investing in 15 Minutes a Week and Payback Time - Making Big Money is the Best Revenge; America's most widely sought-after speaker on investing; regular guest on CNBC's The Millionaire Inside, MSNBC’s Your Business, and guest on Maria Bartiromo’s show Closing Bell.

Janet Bray Attwood – NY Times bestselling co-author of The Passion Test and Your Hidden Riches; creator of the #1 tool used worldwide to discover passion and purpose with over 1,500 facilitators in more than 60 countries; along with her ex-husband, Chris, she arranged 70% of the interviews for the book and movie phenomenon, The Secret.

Dr. Daniel Amen – Called “the most popular psychiatrist in America” by the Washington Post. A physician, double board certified psychiatrist, teacher and nine-time New York Times bestselling author; Founder and Medical Director of Amen Clinics; named by Sharecare as the web’s #1 most influential mental health expert and advocate.

Mary Morrissey - Sought after expert on the “Spiritual Side of Success," founder and owner of Life Mastery Institute, The Premier Life Coach Certification Company; New Thought leader who has spoken three times at the United Nations, facilitated three different week-long meetings with His Holiness The Dalai Lama and met with Nelson Mandela in Cape Town, South Africa to address our world's most significant issues.

Marci Shimoff – One of the bestselling female nonfiction authors of all time with more than 16 million copies sold and books that have spent 118 weeks on the New York Times bestseller lists, including Chicken Soup for the Woman’s Soul, Chicken Soup for the Mother’s Soul, Love for No Reason, and Happy for No Reason: 7 Steps to Being Happy from the Inside Out.

Mike Koenigs – Ten-time #1 bestselling author, interactive online TV producer and host of the “Mike Koenigs Show”, winner of the “Marketer of the Year” award, serial entrepreneur, angel investor, filmmaker, international speaker and patented inventor. He’s also the “Chief Disruptasaurus” of the MiXiV Media Network.

Chris Attwood – Co-author of the NY Times bestsellers, The Passion Test and Your Hidden Riches; international expert on creating “enlightened alliances;” Founder of the Beyul Club & Resorts.

Roger Hamilton – Futurist, social entrepreneur and NY Times bestselling author of The Millionaire Master Plan; creator of the Genius Test, Wealth Dynamics & Talent Dynamics profiling systems, used by over 250,000 people around the world; Founder of Entrepreneurs Institute, Vision Villa Resorts and the online learning platform, GeniusU.com with over 500,000 members.

Claire Zammit – Co-Founder of Evolving Wisdom, on Inc. Magazine’s list of fastest growing companies; co-creator of the Feminine Power courses which have reached over 500,000 women; co- author of the forthcoming book, Feminine Power: Awakening to the Creative Force of Life; co-creator and co-host of the internationally acclaimed Women on the Edge of Evolution teleseries.

Doron Libshtein – Former President of MSNBC Israel; Founder, Chairman and CEO of Mentors Channel which reaches over 2,700,000 people worldwide and has produced programs for Deepak Chopra, Arianna Huffington, Byron Katie, Janet Bray Attwood, and Robin Sharma. 

Robert Scheinfeld – NY Times bestselling author of Busting Loose From the Money Game; sought after international speaker; bender of reality and creator of the “Ultimate Freedom Teachings.” Rorbert is a renegade entrepreneur turned author, speaker and coach. After creating multi-million dollar successes, his teachings come from his own experience, which he calls, "The Treasure Hunt of the Century."

Scott Hoffman – Co-Founder of Folio Literary Management, one of America’s premier literary agencies; former political consultant; literary agent for dozens of New York Times bestselling authors.

Joel Roberts - Former, prime-time, KABC radio talk show host in the world’s #1 radio market – Los Angeles. Considered the premier media coach in the publishing world. His clients include NY Times best-selling authors, politicians, celebrities, CEOs and Fortune 500 corporations like Lockheed-Martin, Eli Lilly, Pfizer, Novartis, Wal-Mart and Target.

Bobbi Deporter - Co-founder and President of Quantum Learning Network, author of more than a dozen books, and protege of Buckminster Fuller. Bobbi is called by some, “the mother of accelerated learning.” Courses she has taught or designed have been attended (at formative points in their careers) by people like: Tony Robbins, Spencer Johnson, Robert Kiyosaki, Ken Blanchard, Jack Canfield, T. Harv Eker, Mark Victor Hansen and others. Bobbi co-founded “SuperCamp” from which over 73,000 students have graduated all over the world.

Debra Poneman - Bestselling author and founder of Yes to Success Seminars, Debra is known as the Mentor to the Mentors.  A pioneer in the self-help movement, since the early 80’s Debra has been creating programs on how to live a life of true and lasting success. Her courses have been taught throughout the world and attended by the biggest names in the transformational world including numerous teachers from the hit movie The Secret. 

The aim of the Club's Patron trainings is to provide you with knowledge, from many perspectives, for solving the most pressing issues facing you in your life.

II. The Beyul Resorts - The Ultimate Reward

  • Models of how heaven can be lived on earth
  • Sustainable design
  • Using ancient principles of building in accord with nature
  • Exquisitely beautiful
  • Ayurvedic rejuvenation centers 
  • Courses offering wisdom in every field of life
  • Honoring all cultures, religions, and traditions

These Resorts will be places you can come to vacation with family and friends, to take courses, and to just relax, reflect, and rejuvenate.

What Will It Be Like to Visit a Beyul Resort?


How Will the Heaven on Earth Project Give Back?

Meditation is a powerful tool for transformation and for creating peace. That's why the Heaven on Earth Project will donate 20% of the profits from the Club & Resorts to teach meditation to populations who need it most: war veterans in the U.S. and war victims in Africa suffering from PTSD, abandoned children in Columbia, the homeless, abused women and children in the U.S., and school children throughout the world.

In addition, a Foundation will be established for funding the consciousness-based projects identified at the Club's annual conferences of thought leaders as most valuable. The Foundation will be funded from the Club's profits and independent donations.

Who's Behind the Project

I'm Chris Attwood, New York Times bestselling author of The Passion Test and Your Hidden Riches. I've spent more than 10 years in extended meditation, sold millions of dollars of consulting and training to Fortune 500 companies, and served as an executive or CEO in 15 businesses. I helped arrange 70% of the interviews for the book and movie phenomenon, "The Secret" and now I'm dedicated to making the vision for the Heaven on Earth Project a reality--with your help and participation.

I've put this photo of me with my wife and kids because they were the original inspiration for this project. This photo was taken with my Mom, 5 days before she passed away just a couple months ago. This project is dedicated to her and her memory. It wouldn't be possible without her.

Radha Patel - Spokesperson and Public Relations

Model, singer, dancer and remarkable human being, Radha Patel grew up surrounded by yoga and spirituality. After finishing university, she followed her passions and joined a touring band which recently released their first single. Widely sought after for her beauty, her talent, and her heart-centered personality, she presents the Heaven on Earth Project to the world as a wonderful expression of someone who is deeply connected to her own inner beyul.

Zachary D. Harris - Member Development Director

Zachary D. Harris, J.D. has been advising philanthropic trusts and high net-worth individuals for 24 years. He has a knack for making matches in which investments are made wisely while realizing significant added value. A resource development professional, Zach is passionate about making the world a better place to live in, especially for those less fortunate. In the last few years, Zach has raised millions of dollars for a variety of worthwhile projects. Some of these include a new pediatric emergency room at a boutique hospital, a new daycare facility for young children with autism, and an innovative rehabilitation program for juvenile delinquents.

Bob Voermans - Resort Development and Sustainability

#1 bestselling author of From Headless Chicken to Golden Goose, Bob started, ran and sold a number of businesses in the Spa and Wellness industry. He opened sales channels, negotiated contracts and setup distribution networks with companies in Europe, China and other parts of Asia. He launched a national wellness gift voucher in the Netherlands that was voted gift card of the year in the category, Wellness & Beauty. Bob holds certifications in sustainable and regenerative design for land, site and business development, including Holistic management, Permaculture and Keyline design.


What Does It Mean to Be a Member?

As an Introductory Member you'll start by creating a profile, getting free help to clarify your passions, your unique genius, and the project you're excited about. You'll be automatically matched with people who may be able to support your project and to fabulous free training content in all the areas you need to make your dreams real--online marketing, business, personal growth, and more. You'll be able to raise funds, create connections, and gain the resources that will make your passion project come to life.
Annual, Founding, and Corporate Members (see video below for description of membership levels) will have a "Personal Learning Consultant" who will meet with you each year to help you design your "Personal Learning Plan"for the coming year. These members will be able to attend Patron trainings, wherever they're offered in the world, at deep discounts not available to the general public. They'll also get private access to Patrons when they attend Patron trainings.

Radha explains the different membership levels . . .

Other Kinds of Membership

Founding Members - Founding Members are people who are committed to realizing the vision of the Beyul Club. They will be leaders in the Club, and they'll receive the most benefits from its success. Founding members receive lifetime membership benefits for themselves and up to 4 additional members of their family. Plus, their heirs will be able to continue to enjoy Club membership for 10 additional years after their death.
That means every year Founding Members and their families will be able to choose from over $250,000 worth of Patron trainings (once the Club has 50+ Patrons) at deeply discounted rates. They'll have a Personal Learning Consultant who will meet with each family member annually and help them develop their Personal Learning Plan for the coming year. They'll participate in the private Personal and Social Action Groups with direct access to the Club's Patrons.
They're the only Members who will receive invitations to attend the Club's Annual Global Thought Leader Conferences in person starting in 2018 (other Members will be able to participate via live stream). As part of these Annual Conferences, Founding Members will participate in the "Founding Members' Circle" each year where they'll hear a report on the Club's past year's progress and contribute to the plans for the coming year. The investment for lifetime membership in the Club as a Founding Member is $100,000. As you consider this, take into account that others pay $50,000 - $100,000 for just 1 year of coaching with the Club's Patrons.
If you feel very strongly about the need for the Heaven on Earth Project in today's world and would like to be considered as a Founding Member, please complete the application here:
Apply here to become a Founding Member

Corporate Members - Companies that want their key team members to have regular, annual training can join the Club as Corporate Members. Up to five (5) team members from the company will be able to participate in Club training courses, led by its Patrons, in business management, marketing, and sales, as well as support in relationships, health, finances and more.

In addition, Corporate Members will have the use of one of the Beyul Resort's 3-bedroom villas for a week a year to use as an incentive for top performers, special clients, or for the owners' own enjoyment.

Corporate memberships provide five year's of membership benefits, but companies who enroll during our crowdfunding campaign will be able to receive deep discounts on Patron training courses starting in 2017, but the company's 5-year membership will not begin until the first Beyul Resort is open (scheduled for Spring, 2021).

That means companies who join the Club now will be able to send their staff to Club courses for almost ten years in total! Corporate membership is $50,000 which amounts to about $2,000 per team member per year.

Apply here to become a Corporate Member


Help Make the Vision Real

Here are a few things you can do:
  • Post a link to the campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Instagram or anywhere else you can think of. Here's an image you can use (BTW - www.createbeyuls.com will send anyone to this page).


Send emails to all your friends. Here's an email you can adopt to your own style:

Dear __________:

I just contributed to the most amazing crowdfunding campaign for the "Heaven on Earth Project." It's all about creating change in ourselves through access to world-class training and banding together to create change in the world at the same time.

It's definitely worth checking out. You can see it here:
www.createbeyuls.com

See you in the Club!

[Your name]


A Parting Thought . . .
story_txt:
Beyuls are the Secret to Fulfilling Dreams . . . and Solving the Puzzle of Life

Dreams.They make life fun, exciting, even thrilling. But do you ever wonder if you'll ever be able to fulfill your dreams? Guess what? Fulfilling your dreams is the key to making sense out of life. When you contribute to this campaign, we'll:
Give you a place to share your dreams, your passions, and turn them into a project others can support
Help you gather a team, get the resources you need, and learn the skills you'll need to make your project real

Make it fun, exciting, and connect you with others so you never feel alone on the path to making your dreams real 


Chris Attwood, the dreamer behind this project, has been helping people realize their dreams and live their passions for quite a while. He:Co-authored the NY Times bestseller, The Passion Test, and has trained over 1,500 Passion Test facilitators in more than 60 countries
Helped one of his students, an unknown Australian TV producer named Rhonda Byrne, realize her dream of creating a movie that "would change the world"--her movie, "The Secret" has been watched by hundreds of millions of people and her #1 NY Times bestselling book has sold millions of copies

Introduced his colleague, T. Harv Eker, to the literary agent that helped him get a 7-figure book deal and helped him refine the strategy that brought tens of thousands of people to his workshops and seminars

Made the introductions that allowed an unknown hypnotist named Tellman Knudson fulfill his dream of building a successful online business that generated over $10 million a year in revenues

Helped a client double the revenues in her business and fulfill her dream of buying her own beautiful home

Helped other clients get six or seven figure book deals and fulfill the dream of becoming a NY Times bestselling author
Now he wants to create a way to help LOTS more people fulfill their dreams and live their passions--starting with you . . .
The Vision


"When your dreams get fulfilled it's the way life tells you that you're aligned with your life's purpose."1)  Create an online Beyul - a sacred space - where you, as a member, can share your passions and rally support  -- create a team, get support, and  find resources; plus connect with others, and yourself to solve the puzzle of your own life 
2)  Provide you with access to world class training—so you can gain the knowledge and training to realize your passion projects, and to deal with life’s challenges along the way3)  Build physical Beyuls - centers of healing and renewal where you can restore yourself, which provide the ultimate reward for your success, and which use ancient technologies to transmit coherence & peace

What is a Beyul?

*Beyuls (Tibetan: སྦས་ཡུལ, Wylie: sbas-yul) are sacred hidden valleys blessed as refuges, where the physical and spiritual worlds overlap, according to the beliefs of the Nyingma school of Tibetan Buddhism. We've expanded this definition to include the quiet place of peace that exists in every heart where the physical and spiritual worlds also overlap and which is the key to fulfilling your heart's desires.

The Steps


 


What Your Contribution Will Help Create


Global Community:

A platform to both give and get support & resources for pursuing your own passion projects

24/7  Access to experts on topics that directly affect your project and your life - business management, online marketing, as well as finances, relationships, etc.
Access to like-minded individuals to collaborate with
Providing both personal growth and social action

World Class Training:



Access to knowledge & experience to realize your passion project
Access to help and wisdom to deal effectively with life's challenges
Courses and resources - available at your convenience - that will jump-start you to the next level of your life such as: 

Discover your purpose • Uncover your genius • Grow your business • Perfect your relationships • Optimize your health • Expand your wealth

Beyul Resorts:


Creating Beyul Sanctuaries where you can where you can relax, reflect & rejuvenate 
Centers for healing and renewal to visit on an individual journey or travel to with your loved ones.
Using modern technologies to integrate with nature  
Using ancient technologies to act as transmitters of coherence and peace






Our Indiegogo Goal: $50,000 +$100,000 from Founding Members



To demonstrate that many peop1e are wi11ing to say, through their contributions, "I want to see The Heaven on Earth Project become a reality!"
To build Stage 1 of the online community platform to launch in Fa11, 2016 so we can begin 1earning and collaborating together
To purchase an option on land for the first Beyu1 so you know you'11 have a p1ace to come


 

What You Get When You Contribute



First and foremost, your contribution is your vote in favor of this project and its vision. To achieve its aims, the Heaven on Earth Project will require financial support from those who've been fortunate enough to create wealth in their own lives. They will only give that support when they see that there are people all around the world who believe in this vision. So, if you think everything you've seen here is worth creating, then please make a contribution and share this link that will bring people to this page with everyone you know:
www.createbeyuls.com
Having said that, there's some very cool perks in store for you when you contribute!

Winner of the Nautilus Book Silver Award in the area of Inner Prosperity and Right Livelihood, this book is a powerful introduction to living in the space where the physical and spiritual worlds overlap.

Experience the Beyul Resort - The Club's first Beyul Resort is planned to open in Spring, 2021. We want you to experience what will be one of the most wonderful and unique places on our planet.
