A physician, double board certified psychiatrist, teacher and nine-time New York Times bestselling author; Founder and Medical Director of Amen Clinics; named by Sharecare as the web’s #1 most influential mental health expert and advocate.


Mary Morrissey - Sought after expert on the “Spiritual Side of Success," founder and owner of Life Mastery Institute, The Premier Life Coach Certification Company; New Thought leader who has spoken three times at the United Nations, facilitated three different week-long meetings with His Holiness The Dalai Lama and met with Nelson Mandela in Cape Town, South Africa to address our world's most significant issues. 


Marci Shimoff – One of the bestselling female nonfiction authors of all time with more than 16 million copies sold and books that have spent 118 weeks on the New York Times bestseller lists, including Chicken Soup for the Woman’s Soul, Chicken Soup for the Mother’s Soul, Love for No Reason, and Happy for No Reason: 7 Steps to Being Happy from the Inside Out.


Mike Koenigs – Ten-time #1 bestselling author, interactive online TV producer and host of the “Mike Koenigs Show”, winner of the “Marketer of the Year” award, serial entrepreneur, angel investor, filmmaker, international speaker and patented inventor. He’s also the “Chief Disruptasaurus” of the MiXiV Media Network.


Chris Attwood – Co-author of the NY Times bestsellers, The Passion Test and Your Hidden Riches; international expert on creating “enlightened alliances;” Founder of the Beyul Club & Resorts. 


Roger Hamilton – Futurist, social entrepreneur and NY Times bestselling author of The Millionaire Master Plan; creator of the Genius Test, Wealth Dynamics & Talent Dynamics profiling systems, used by over 250,000 people around the world; Founder of Entrepreneurs Institute, Vision Villa Resorts and the online learning platform, GeniusU.com with over 500,000 members.


Claire Zammit – Co-Founder of Evolving Wisdom, on Inc. Magazine’s list of fastest growing companies; co-creator of the Feminine Power courses which have reached over 500,000 women; co- author of the forthcoming book, Feminine Power: Awakening to the Creative Force of Life; co-creator and co-host of the internationally acclaimed Women on the Edge of Evolution teleseries.


Doron Libshtein – Former President of MSNBC Israel; Founder, Chairman and CEO of Mentors Channel which reaches over 2,700,000 people worldwide and has produced programs for Deepak Chopra, Arianna Huffington, Byron Katie, Janet Bray Attwood, and Robin Sharma. 

Robert Scheinfeld – NY Times bestselling author of Busting Loose From the Money Game; sought after international speaker; bender of reality and creator of the “Ultimate Freedom Teachings.” Rorbert is a renegade entrepreneur turned author, speaker and coach. After creating multi-million dollar successes, his teachings come from his own experience, which he calls, "The Treasure Hunt of the Century."



Scott Hoffman – Co-Founder of Folio Literary Management, one of America’s premier literary agencies; former political consultant; literary agent for dozens of New York Times bestselling authors.


Joel Roberts - Former, prime-time, KABC radio talk show host in the world’s #1 radio market – Los Angeles. Considered the premier media coach in the publishing world. His clients include NY Times best-selling authors, politicians, celebrities, CEOs and Fortune 500 corporations like Lockheed-Martin, Eli Lilly, Pfizer, Novartis, Wal-Mart and Target.


Bobbi Deporter - Co-founder and President of Quantum Learning Network, author of more than a dozen books, and protege of Buckminster Fuller. Bobbi is called by some, “the mother of accelerated learning.” Courses she has taught or designed have been attended (at formative points in their careers) by people like:  Tony Robbins, Spencer Johnson, Robert Kiyosaki, Ken Blanchard, Jack Canfield, T. Harv Eker, Mark Victor Hansen and others. Bobbi co-founded “SuperCamp” from which over 73,000 students have graduated all over the world.


Debra Poneman - Bestselling author and founder of Yes to Success Seminars, Debra is known as the Mentor to the Mentors.  A pioneer in the self-help movement, since the early 80’s Debra has been creating programs on how to live a life of true and lasting success. Her courses have been taught throughout the world and attended by the biggest names in the transformational world including numerous teachers from the hit movie The Secret. 





The aim of the Club's Patron trainings is to provide you with knowledge, from many perspectives, for solving the most pressing issues facing you in your life.

 
II. The Beyul Resorts - The Ultimate Reward

Models of how heaven can be lived on earth
Sustainable design

Using ancient principles of building in accord with nature

Exquisitely beautiful

Ayurvedic rejuvenation centers 

Courses offering wisdom in every field of life

Honoring all cultures, religions, and traditions



 

These Resorts will be places you can come to vacation with family and friends, to take courses, and to just relax, reflect, and rejuvenate.

 


What Will It Be Like to Visit a Beyul Resort? 




How Will the Heaven on Earth Project Give Back?



Meditation is a powerful tool for transformation and for creating peace. That's why the Heaven on Earth Project will donate 20% of the profits from the Club & Resorts to teach meditation to populations who need it most: war veterans in the U.S. and war victims in Africa suffering from PTSD, abandoned children in Columbia, the  homeless, abused women and children in the U.S., and school children throughout the world. 
In addition, a Foundation will be established for funding the consciousness-based projects identified at the Club's annual conferences of thought leaders as most valuable. The Foundation will be funded from the Club's profits and independent donations. 



 
Who's Behind the Project




I'm Chris Attwood, New York Times bestselling author of The Passion Test and Your Hidden Riches. I've spent more than 10 years in extended meditation, sold millions of dollars of consulting and training to Fortune 500 companies, and served as an executive or CEO in 15 businesses. I helped arrange 70% of the interviews for the book and movie phenomenon, "The Secret" and now I'm dedicated to making the vision for the Heaven on Earth Project a reality--with your help and participation.

I've put this photo of me with my wife and kids because they were the original inspiration for this project. This photo was taken with my Mom, 5 days before she passed away just a couple months ago. This project is dedicated to her and her memory. It wouldn't be possible without her. 
 

Radha Patel - Spokesperson and Public Relations 
Model, singer, dancer and remarkable human being, Radha Patel grew up surrounded by yoga and spirituality. After finishing university, she followed her passions and joined a touring band which recently released their first single. Widely sought after for her beauty, her talent, and her heart-centered personality, she presents the Heaven on Earth Project to the world as a wonderful expression of someone who is deeply connected to  her own inner beyul.

 

Zachary D. Harris - Member Development Director
Zachary D. Harris, J.D. has been advising philanthropic trusts and high net-worth individuals for 24 years.  He has a knack for making matches in which investments are made wisely while realizing significant added value.  A resource development professional, Zach is passionate about making the world a better place to live in, especially for those less fortunate.  In the last few years, Zach has raised millions of dollars for a variety of worthwhile projects.  Some of these  include a new pediatric emergency room at a boutique hospital, a new daycare facility for young children with autism, and an innovative rehabilitation program for juvenile delinquents. 
 

Bob Voermans - Resort Development and Sustainability
#1 bestselling author of From Headless Chicken to Golden Goose, Bob started, ran and sold a number of businesses in the Spa and Wellness industry. He opened sales channels, negotiated contracts and setup distribution networks with companies in Europe, China and other parts of Asia. He launched a national wellness gift voucher in the Netherlands that was voted gift card of the year in the category, Wellness & Beauty. Bob holds certifications in sustainable and regenerative design for land, site and business development, including Holistic management, Permaculture and Keyline design.







What Does It Mean to Be a Member?

As an Introductory Member you'll start by creating a profile, getting free help to clarify your passions, your unique genius, and the project you're excited about. You'll be automatically matched with people who may be able to support your project and to fabulous free training content in all the areas you need to make your dreams real--online marketing, business, personal growth, and more. You'll be able to raise funds, create connections, and gain the resources that will make your passion project come to life.


Annual, Founding, and Corporate Members (see video below for description of membership levels) will have a "Personal Learning Consultant" who will meet with you each year to help you design your "Personal Learning Plan"for the coming year. These members will be able to attend Patron trainings, wherever they're offered in the world, at deep discounts not available to the general public. They'll also get private access to Patrons when they attend Patron trainings.



Radha explains the different membership levels . . .




Other Kinds of Membership

Founding Members - Founding Members are people who are committed to realizing the vision of the Beyul Club. They will be leaders in the Club, and they'll receive the most benefits from its success. Founding members receive lifetime membership benefits for themselves and up to 4 additional members of their family. Plus, their heirs will be able to continue to enjoy Club membership for 10 additional years after their death. 

That means every year Founding Members and their families will be able to choose from over $250,000 worth of Patron trainings (once the Club has 50+ Patrons) at deeply discounted rates. They'll have a Personal Learning Consultant who will meet with each family member annually and help them develop their Personal Learning Plan for the coming year. They'll participate in the private Personal and Social Action Groups with direct access to the Club's Patrons. 

They're the only Members who will receive invitations to attend the Club's Annual Global Thought Leader Conferences in person starting in 2018 (other Members will be able to participate via live stream). As part of these Annual Conferences, Founding Members will participate in the "Founding Members' Circle" each year where they'll hear a report on the Club's past year's progress and contribute to the plans for the coming year. The investment for lifetime membership in the Club as a Founding Member is $100,000. As you consider this, take into account that others pay $50,000 - $100,000 for just 1 year of coaching with the Club's Patrons. 
If you feel very strongly about the need for the Heaven on Earth Project in today's world and would like to be considered as a Founding Member, please complete the application here:   


Apply here to become a Founding Member 
 
Corporate Members - Companies that want their key team members to have regular, annual training can join the Club as Corporate Members. Up to five (5) team members from the company will be able to participate in Club training courses, led by its Patrons, in business management, marketing, and sales, as well as support in relationships, health, finances and more. 
In addition, Corporate Members will have the use of one of the Beyul Resort's 3-bedroom villas for a week a year to use as an incentive for top performers, special clients, or for the owners' own enjoyment. 
Corporate memberships provide five year's of membership benefits, but companies who enroll during our crowdfunding campaign will be able to receive deep discounts on Patron training courses starting in 2017, but the company's 5-year membership will not begin until the first Beyul Resort is open (scheduled for Spring, 2021). 
That means companies who join the Club now will be able to send their staff to Club courses for almost ten years in total! Corporate membership is $50,000 which amounts to about $2,000 per team member per year. 

Apply here to become a Corporate Member










Help Make the Vision Real

Here are a few things you can do:



Post a link to the campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Instagram or anywhere else you can think of. Here's an image you can use (BTW - www.createbeyuls.com will send anyone to this page).






Send emails to all your friends. Here's an email you can adopt to your own style:
Dear __________:I just contributed to the most amazing crowdfunding campaign for the "Heaven on Earth Project." It's all about creating change in ourselves through access to world-class training and banding together to create change in the world at the same time. It's definitely worth checking out. You can see it here:www.createbeyuls.comSee you in the Club![Your name]

A Parting Thought . . .

story:
Do you ever think about how things could be different? Imagine a society made up of free individuals, making conscious, informed decisions, peacefully cooperating and organizing for mutual benefit, empowered by a culture that inspires action, focused on solutions, looking to the future, while not forgetting the past. Think about it. We’re convinced that, with the right tools, this is possible.

Project Dèmos: Co-Creating An Empowering Platform
www.projectdemos.net

Care to watch the full length concept introduction? Click here!

The Project

The Dèmos community is proud to present Project Dèmos.

Project Dèmos (demos meaning people) is about freedom and empowerment through technology. We know there is a much more efficient way to communicate, organize, and co-create on a worldwide basis, and therefore believe the time has come to update societal organization to contemporary possibilities.

The Platform

The Dèmos community works to create an all-encompassing, transparent, and user-friendly platform for efficient communication, cooperation, and co-creation. We strive to empower people to be able to contribute peacefully, and proactively to societal transformation, in the comfort of a safe online environment, with the look and feel of a game.

The Dèmos Platform combines communication and social networking, problem-solution management and co-creation, grassroots organization (which is natural and spontaneous bottom-up organization), upward control (which is the influence an individual has on public discourse), engagement characters, delegation, and economics into one single interface.

Method of Operation

We keep track of, and discuss the latest technological solutions that contribute to individual empowerment and co-creation on our website (www.projectdemos.net), if possible, integrate them into the blueprints, and continuously update and share what we envision to be the most ideal Dèmos Platform.

Alongside the creation of the Dèmos Platform, we produce a documentary detailing its blueprints, and potential political, cultural and socio-economic implications. We rely on donations and crowdfunding to finance the creation of a bèta and final platform.

The future Project Dèmos website, with its integrated forum and social network, is an environment for people committed to the project to efficiently and productively combine their efforts. By interacting and cooperating with similar initiatives, we build upon our collective strengths, as we build towards an open future.

We follow a ten step roadmap, focused on three general phases:

  • Informing, developing & visualizing:

(1) At first, we lay down the groundwork that will form the basis of the project, by presenting realistic possibilities and technological solutions that contribute to empowerment and co-creation. We release articles, videos, and interviews in order to keep the public dialogue going, continuously updating and sharing what we envision to be the most ideal version of the Dèmos Platform.

(2, 3 & 4) Donations, and, if needed, an additional crowdfunding campaign finance the production of a documentary, providing an in-depth analysis of the project, detailing the blueprints of the Dèmos Platform, and its potential political, cultural and socio-economic implications.

(5 & 6) With the documentary we reach out to a broader public, presenting our findings, focusing attention on our next step, namely, launching another crowdfunding campaign to finance the creation of the actual Dèmos Platform.

  • Creating:

(7) At this point we recruit a team of dedicated enthusiasts which will be challenged with the task of coding the Dèmos Platform.

  • Putting Dèmos into practice:

(8) We release the Dèmos Platform to numerous groups for beta testing.

(9) We release the Dèmos Platform to the public, making the platform open source and accessible to everyone.

(10) We keep improving the platform, creating extensions, and provide support to the community.

Budget

To pay for steps 1 through 6:

Foundation & overhead: €70.000

  • incorporation (non-profit)
  • legal
  • insurance
  • housing & furniture

Human resource: €380.000

  • remuneration (± 8 FTEs)
  • travel expenses

Media, design, development, promotion, PR, documentary: €165.000

  • blogs, website & social media
  • campaigns
  • visualization, audio & video
  • translators
  • consultancy, partners & ambassadors

Miscellaneous & unforeseen: €210.000

  • taxes
  • Indiegogo & payment fees
  • buffer

Total: €825.000 (±$895.000)

Any remaining funds (in case we need less than expected or surpass the target amount) will go toward paying for steps 7 through 10. Even if we don't reach our goal, your donations will help us greatly. We will do everything we can to realize the project and platform, including (but not limited to, of course) looking for additional funding.

Team

"I always wondered why somebody doesn't do something about that. Then I realized I was somebody."

Project Dèmos was founded in 2013 by a group of versatile cosmopolitans; activists, engineers, entrepreneurs, journalists, open-source designers, developers and programmers, philosophers, politicians, scientists, students, and the like.

“You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.”

We believe:

  • that regardless of one's personal opinions and preferences, the time has come to think about updating societal organization to contemporary possibilities;
  • that technological advances increasingly provide humanity with the tools to interact, find a common ground, and co-create our shared reality and consciousness;
  • that openly sharing information, transparency, and voluntary cooperation lead to conscious decisions, that these in turn lead to a universal rise in the standard of living, and enable us to prevent conflicts and create a sustainable future.
We (Steyn Foorthuis and Roman van Ree) have been working on Project Dèmos for about three years, and would like to be able to quit our day jobs, to be able focus all our time and effort on realizing the Dèmos Platform.

We sincerely invite everyone to join the Dèmos community, and are looking to strengthen our team with dedicated enthusiasts. You can contribute to the project by creating an account on our (future) website, sharing and reflecting on ideas on the integrated forum and social network, and keeping track of our blog and social media. We are working in our free time, on a minimal budget, so, any and all contributions to make the project a success are greatly appreciated. Don't forget to share our campaign with your friends and family!

In peace, love, and liberty,

The Project Dèmos Team

Diaspora
Facebook
Google+
Tumblr
Twitter
Vimeo
Youtube

e-mail

(Project Dèmos reserves the right to refuse inappropriate links or images that are submitted as part of our perks program)

story:
Continuing To Serve You... 

Hello, my name is Taeisha Black. As a Manager of more than 20 years with one of the most celebrated natural hair salons in the country, I feel it is my duty to carry on its legacy.  It is a legacy steeped in customer care that offers a nurturing, safe space for our clients to bond and beautify.  A solution centered salon for your hair care needs and desires.  This legacy now includes three generations. It allows us to have a positive and inspring space for our young daughters and sons to feel proud and confident in their natural tresses and the styling options offered to them. 

While the doors have closed at Khamit Kinks, a door has opened for me to continue to grow and to hone my skills, not only as a Manager, but also as a Stylist, Stylist Coach, and Consultant. I can continue to practice my passion to beautify and serve. The name of my new salon will be Kinky Kollective.

Your donations will allow me and my team to acquire a space where we can offer the best in styling and service.

With your contributions, we will be able to take what we already have to the next level.  We will open a salon that will address not only your hair but other beauty services will be available to you under one roof ~ lashes, brows, facials, and other express beauty services to meet your needs.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $25,000.00. Your contributions will go towards:

  • Two months deposit and the first month's rent
  • Build out of the salon space
  • Installation of shampoo bowls, wall dryers, and lighting
  • plumbing, electrical, painting
  • Installation of communication systems, phones, wifi,
  • We are offering perks that we look forward to sharing with you
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, funds received will go towards securing a new space.

I enjoy serving others and thrived in my former work environment. There, I had the opportunity to meet and work with countless clients whose lives were transformed by the hair artistry offered at the salon.

It’s now possible to make my dream a reality. Our styling team will help to actualize my mission to continue training and coaching the next generation of stylists to treat, groom, and style healthy hair.

Our team and our clients are accustomed to an environment with a particular ambiance. We are currently sharing space in a salon that is not our own. While we’re grateful to be able to continue working, this temporary setting cannot accommodate the level of service we’re accustomed to providing. We must have our own salon space.  Your donations will help us to secure the type of salon space and environment we’ve come to be known for – a salon that is beautiful, welcoming, inspiring, and relaxing.

By backing this project you can be a part of helping to continue a legacy started by my mentor Anu Prestonia more than 40 years ago.  It was her mission to serve Black women and men while celebrating their value and the greatness of our people. You will be helping to keep a legacy alive, growing and thriving.

We need your help to meet this goal.  Please donate.

Risks & Challenges

There are some risks and challenges with this project.  Finding a large enough space that is affordable proves to be quite challenging in the New York real estate market. It is our desire to remain in downtown Brooklyn, but considering the cost of rents, we may have to consider other neighborhoods.

We have looked at dozens of spaces and we are certain of what will and won't work.  Over the years we have always worked from large and beautiful spaces.  With so many spaces on the market for rent, we are certain that we will find the right location.

We are working with a seasoned real estate broker to help us find the perfect home for Kinky Kollection.



Please Share our Campaign

Please share this campaign on your social media spaces or send it out via email to friends and family.

You can share right from the communication icons at the top of the page.

story:
Our mission is to remove at risk cats from shelters and in to forever homes. Our hope is that Namastray will help to shape the future of animal rescue and adoption as we know it.  

 

 

Summary:

   We have combined our concern for animal welfare and the love for human wellness to present to you Namastray, a 501(c)(3) Nonprofit Cat Rescue & Lounge. 

  Overpopulation and limited resources are still a major concern everywhere. In fact, 70% of cats who enter a shelter do not make it out alive. Namastray is a cat rescue that will save cats and kittens from shelters who are considered at risk for euthanasia. Shelters can be very stressful for a homeless pet, and many are unable to thrive in that environment. This is our call to action. 

   

Logistics:

    Operating in the form of a lounge, Namastray will offer a relaxing environment to hang out with the adoptable cats. Our lounge will serve as a foster home while our team works to find placement for all of the cats in our care. A zen space free of cages allows guests to interact with the cats in a natural setting.

    We will offer a variety of services such as yoga, meditation, sound baths, and workshops that will benefit the humans and felines. 

   Cats are a healing species, their purrs fluctuate between 20-140 Hz, a frequency range that is proven to be medically therapeutic. We are building a sanctuary dedicated to promoting healing and compassion, and it is only possible because of humans like you who are willing to give these cats a second chance at life.
   
Our goal is to help you achieve inner peace while providing the cats with socialization and stimulation. We bring our love of self-care and pet-care together in the hopes of building some “furever” friendships.

    We sincerely thank you for visiting this page and supporting our mission. Your donation will change the lives of animals in need. The more funds Namastray is able to raise, the better the environment we can create for the cats and for you!

 

 

Donations will be used for:

-Securing and leasing a location

-Construction to comply with CA zoning laws and renovations to ensure cat safety: flooring, painting, drywall, etc. 

-HVAC update and specialized air filtration

-Licensing and permits 

-Hygiene supplies: washer and dryer, dishwasher, towels, disinfectants, and other cleaning tools

-Medical care, spay and neuter, vaccinations, and medications 

-FOOD & LITTER

-Furnishings:  cat safe furniture, tables, towers, storage,  on site quarantine temporary housing, and  cabinetry installation

-Yoga equipment: yoga mats, blocks, bolsters, straps, and blankets

All donations made to Namastray are tax deductible. 

 

Other ways you can help:

   If you believe in our mission and want to help - share this crowdfunding campaign with your friends, your family, and especially on social media! Please tag us at @namastraycatlounge and use the hashtag #namastray  

Follow every step of the  journey on INSTAGRAM & FACEBOOK 

Visit our WEBSITE 

We would love to hear from you! Reach out with any questions and comments: namastraysd@gmail.com 

 

 

With gratitude,

story:
Short Summary

Hello world!

Ben Waxman along with his fiance Whitney Reynolds, and parents Dory and Dan Waxman are the co-founders of American Roots. AR is a 100% American made textile company producing high quality Polartec fleece outer wear.

The Mission is simple: "“Our mission is to create good jobs in the United States, deliver a quality product, have a commitment to our community, our workers, and our country, and support a better more sustainable way of life.”

A little less than three years ago Ben returned from Washington DC and working for the AFL-CIO and in the political arena to his hometown of Portland, Maine. He came home to be close to his family, his friends from childhood, and the community and state he deeply loves.  His love of the labor movement and politics had not changed but his vision to leave a lasting mark in life had. He wanted to build something that created jobs in his hometown, and was part of the solution for changing the US and global economy.  Manufacturing was in his bones through his family.

After months of trying to determine what to build, Ben's mother Dory, owner of Old Port Wool & Textile the sister company to American Roots, invited him to take a drive to her wool provider in Woonsocket Rhode Island. Dory had an idea for him to help grow a blanket line through his network.  So Ben and his fiancé Whitney Reynolds jumped in his Ford Explorer and headed south.  It was that hot July day standing on the floor of an old mill listening to the machines shake the walls that Ben looked at Whitney and said “we are gonna build a factory …and it’s gonna change the game.”  

Of course Ben finally came to realize that while he grew up hauling 100 pound rolls of wool for his mother and father with the family company Casco Bay Wool Works and now Old Port Wool and Textile, it would be a partnership with Polartec of Lawrence Massachusetts, the leader in manufactured fleece  that would set in motion what has become the foundation of our company, our dream and now our reality.  American Roots was born.

 With a newly trained, soon to be unionized workforce from the Old Port Wool and Textile training school, whose pride in their work and commitment is an inspiration to us all, we are ready to roll!

We are at a point where we have to get to the next level in our launch and that is why we need your help. On Wednesday, October 21st, our company American Roots will launch as will our capital campaign working with Indiegogo.  The money raised through our Indiegogo campaign will round out our ability to begin production.

My partner and love of my life Whitney Reynolds along with my parents Dan and Dory have made an incredible team. My love for my community, my country, and my belief that we can make things in America has never been stronger.

By contributing today you will help propel a company with the means to acquire orders to grow the production capacity, purchase in advance raw goods from Polartec and meet the pending orders of the fiscal year.


What We Need & What You Get

We have 3 pillars of finance for success:

1.  Personal investment; American Roots along with its sister company Old Port Wool and Textile (OPWT) has already invested roughly $50,000.00 for our initial start up costs and countless hours of sweat equity. We have managed to equip our factory with all new machinery, a 12 week training program with our first wave of team members, raw goods from Polartec and our other vendors for prototypes and first 350 pieces to be completed in November, initial marketing and build out costs, and other overhead items. 

2.  Silent Lender; Based on the rapid growth of American Roots a need for additional financing was an immediate need, for the purchase of raw goods from Polartec, our vendors, marketing costs, additional staff growth to allow full time commitment we sought $100,000.00 in private individuals through a silent lender program. We are approaching our goal!

3. Crowd Funding; through a comprehensive roll out we intend to launch our Indiegogo campaign the first week of October with two objectives; first to launch our company American Roots to the masses. Second to acquire the buy in and commitment of our known and unknown supporters with the goal of raising $75,000 over the course of 45 days. 

Our Rewards!

We value of our contributors and want them to be a part of American Roots for years to come! 

By donating the following you will receive the following!

25.00- AR thank you card and 5% of first purchase

26.00 - 50.00 AR thank you note and AR fleece hat 

51.00- 100.00. AR fleece hat, free shipping  or 5% off first purchase 

100- 250.00 . An AR hat and a tee shirt 

251-500 . An AR tee shirt or hat and 10% off 

501 -1000. An AR hat , a t-shirt and a blanket , 10% off first order

1000-2500 An AR t- shirt, an AR fleece hat , two AR fleece blankets - 15% off first order 

2500-5000. 20 % Off your order - free shipping on all holiday orders - two blankets -a vest and hat and your name on Honor Wall at American Roots factory. 


The Impact

By contributing to the American Roots campaign you are investing in people. You are investing in American jobs. You are investing in a movement to create sustainable economic growth for current and future generations. We believe that giving the American consumer a choice on where their clothing is made is a critical choice in a changing global economy.
We want to be the company that changes the game on manufacturing in the USA. We will be paying good wages, provide good benefits, a strong bonus structure, and have a unionized factory so that every team member has a voice every day on the job. 

Risks & Challenges

We are a second generation textile company that has taken its collective network, resources and knowledge to launch a company that will be unique to the market place. We believe in making the highest quality product made in the USA. 

With the challenges of an every growing competitive global economy, American roots will be focused on a two track business model. In order to over come challenges in the industry, AR will utilize its ability to be efficient with its highly trained workforce, competitive pricing, and its build to scale business model. " You order it, and we make it! " says co-founder Whitney Reynolds. 

By having a build to scale business model it limits our short term risk and allows us to focus on a strategic short and long term growth plan. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant make a contribution to this incredible campaign to bring good paying American manufacturing jobs back home then please help us spread the word to your friends and family! Share our campaign!

story:
White Pines Skate Park for Gabriel Goszulak (April 8th, 1999-October 19th, 2015)

A caring young man had a vision of there being a skate park made in his struggling small town of Arnold, CA where kids could have a safe place to play and be active.  My son, Gabriel “Goose" Goszualk had a vision and a plan.  He had already started designing the skate park himself and had even approached local Calaveras County council member Michael Oliveira about his dream all on his own.  Just after Goose passed last October 19 in a tragic car crash at 16 years old, Oliveira was quoted as having met with Goose 10 months ago about the skate park and that plans were already in motion!  My 16 year old son had already got his vision started and plans moving all on his own! 

We are so proud of him : )  Now, it is time to see his vision through!  We want to build something he would be proud of and a skate park worthy of bringing people in from out of town to help this small town.  We will need to design, get permits, materials, and build it.  Thankfully, the local government is already behind this!  We ask all to share this fundraising campaign and donate whatever they can to the cause.  Please help us make a young man’s dreams come true and create a safe place for kids to play in his community as he had wanted and already got going : )
